attributes.action: serve justice to the world and prosecute george bush and tony blair for war crimes in iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: George bush and tony blair should be prosecuted for the unjustifed war in iraq. they should serve time for the loss of every human life(uk,us,iraqi, etc) also for all held in Guantánamo Bay to stand fair trial

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
